message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.CY

The paper discusses the use of artificial intelligence to improve the security and reliability of smart contracts on blockchain, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also touches upon the development and deployment of smart contracts, which could be categorized under distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) and software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the implications of the alliance between AI and blockchain, which could be categorized under cryptography and security (cs.CY).
